page.title: 11Employment Littlebourne area
page.content: Work in the area was formerly agricultural + related trades. Now it is much more varied with many people travelling to Canterbury, London, Dover + Thanet. The Hospital, the University, Training College are most represented in Canterbury, Shipping at Dover. In the area {Farms}Twymans, Holdstock, Mounts, Spencer. Market gardens Wyants, Newings. {Shops}9 in L'bourne, 1 in Ickham + W'breux. Nursing Homes Littlebourne House, Ickham Rectory. {Builders} Kirk Bros, Goldfinch, Muddiman, Knights, Dennes.{ {Garages}Jelleys, St. Georges, Casino.{ {Schools}2, pubs and Restaurants 9 Inkpen Stakes at Bramling, Wyants Dog training Kennels, Howletts Zoo Park. There are 8 craft workshops in the farm buildings of L'bourne Court including Canterbury Bears, Metalwork, Antique restoration and Cabinetmaker.
